info.description:
Blue Pill
=========

Blue Pill is a mock server intended for testing `Matrix <https://matrix.org>`__
SDKs.

Installation
------------

Via PyPI:

.. code:: bash

  pip install bluepill

From source:

.. code:: bash

  git clone https://github.com/SShrike/bluepill.git
  cd bluepill
  pip install .
info.name: bluepill
info.summary: A mock server for testing Matrix SDKs.
